conversation_log.user_message: I've been working on a React component
conversation_log.valor_response: I see you mentioned earlier having some JWT auth issues too. Want to tell me more about the React component you're working on? That way I can better understand if it ties into the auth flow or if it's a separate feature. And yeah, regarding those JWT expiration issues - implementing refresh tokens would definitely be a good solution there. We could tackle that if you want.

conversation_flow.suggestions: Consider using a more conversational segue, such as asking how the JWT issues have impacted the React component development.
